questions.title: 你觉得《泰坦尼克号》这部电影怎么样？
questions.answer: What do you say to the film Titanic?

questions.title: 你觉得今天下午召开一个商务会议怎么样？
questions.answer: What do you say to having a business meeting this afternoon?

questions.title: 你觉得跟我约会怎么样啊？
questions.answer: What do you say to having an appointment with me?

questions.title: 还是不够，来点扬州炒饭怎么样啊？
questions.answer: It's not enough, what do you say to some Yung Chow Fried Rice?

questions.title: 你想和我一起开车去西藏吗？
questions.answer: What do you say to driving to Tibet with me?

questions.title: 来点轻音乐怎么样？
questions.answer: What do you say to listening to some light music?

answer.en: What do you say to this ice cream?

title: ——外面正在下雨，你觉得在家打牌怎么样？
——不错的主意。

answer.en: It's raining, what do you say to playing cards at home?

title: ——你觉得我买郊区的别墅怎么样？
——离市区太远了。

answer.en: What do you say to buying the villa which is in the suburb?
It's too far from the city.
